name: Maya & The Enchanted Forest
description:
Maya, a magician, sets out to find a strange hundred-year-old flower in a magical forest. Will you only get a hundred-year-old flower? What are the challenges in a forgotten village? Can you defeat strange creatures?

It will be a favorite game for those who like adventure games. The game is difficult, so it will be more convenient for those who like challenges.

If you have any bugs or errors in the game and suggestions, you can write in the comments or send an email to yangoomgames@outlook.com.

After playing the game, please comment on your experience. And don't forget to rate the game. Have Fun!
